comment:
My opponent is a 67 year old semi-retired
GP, living at Bendi Junction, who quickly informed me that he had known Purdy.

Trying to improve on 9...Be7 with which I had scored 0/2. My opponent
also favours the Najdorf.

moves: 1. e4 c5 2. Nf3 d6 3. d4 cxd4 4. Nxd4 Nf6 5. Nc3 a6 6. Bg5 e6 7. f4 Qb6 8. Nb3 Nbd7 9. Qf3 Qc7 10. Bd3 b5 11. O-O-O Bb7 12. Bxf6 Nxf6 13. Kb1 Be7

At this point my
opponent took a month off to avoid distraction from the Sydney Olympics.
